KeyId.description: A unique identifier for the CMK you are tagging. You can use the unique key ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK. Examples:   Unique key ID: 1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab    Key ARN: arn:aws:kms:us-east-2:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab

Tags.description: One or more tags. Each tag consists of a tag key and a tag value.
